title: Short black
brief_description: This tightly scripted work employs Chandleresque dialogue, noirish mise en scene and high key lighting to create a wisecracking, character driven crime story. Inanimate clay figures and controlled comic timing create characters in an absurdist style which draw viewers’ attention to the features of the genre.
